mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MOVIE ORDER BY date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE(MOVIENAME, POSTERIMGSRC, MOVIEAGE, AUDIENCE, TICKETING, DATE) VALUES(#{movieName}, #{posterImgSrc}, #{movieAge}, #{audience}, #{ticketing}, #{date})
mapper.select: SELECT m.movieName, m.date, posterImgSrc, movieAge, audience, ticketing, n.code as "naverCode", n.starRating as "naverStarRating", d.code as "daumCode", d.starRating as "daumStarRating" FROM movie m LEFT OUTER JOIN naver n ON m.movieName = n.movieName AND m.date = n.date LEFT OUTER JOIN daum d ON m.movieName = d.movieName AND m.date = m.date;

SELECT m.movieName, m.date, posterImgSrc, movieAge, audience, ticketing, n.code as "naverCode", n.starRating as "naverStarRating", d.code as "daumCode", d.starRating as "daumStarRating" FROM movie m LEFT OUTER JOIN naver n ON m.movieName = n.movieName AND m.date = n.date LEFT OUTER JOIN daum d ON m.movieName = d.movieName AND m.date = m.date WHERE n.code = #{naverCode};
